venue.address_1: Gowen's Corner Plaza at Route 33 and Bayside
venue.name: The KRI Center for Consciousness Studies

item.description:
KRI: Beyond the Research

  Join in as the entire Kitt Research Initiative team reveals their 
  memorable moments and experiences from past investigations. Due to 
  the high standards the KRI adheres to in regard to what qualifies as 
  evidence, we have collected many experiences along the way that 
  didn't make it to that status. We are proud to now be able to share 
  these experiences with you. Come ask the team your paranormal 
  questions or listen to what really goes on behind the scenes at an 
  investigation. Enjoy an informative and entertaining evening , as 
  the KRI takes you beyond the research.

  The KRI Team:


  AJ KITT, VALERIE ROY, MIKE STEVENS and ISABEAU ESBY,



  All belief systems welcome.

  Registration is NOT required, drop ins absolutely welcome, open to the public

   Cost - $10 suggested donation
item.how_to_find_us: From the I-95, take exit 3 (95 northbound) or exit 3B (southbound) to Route 33 W. The Center will be 2.6 miles on the right, at the corner of 33 and Bayside, in the Gowen's Corner Plaza. The entrance is just to the left of Bayside Custon Frame
item.name: KRI: Behind The Research
